definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: Freeze grapes and put them into a zippered plastic bag.
sentences.chinese: 準備一些冷凍的葡萄，裝在一個密實袋裏。

sentences.english: The fungi then grow in shoes, especially tight ones without air circulation.
sentences.chinese: 而後真菌可在鞋中生長，特別是不透氣的密實的鞋子。

sentences.english: In the pouring process, we should control the uniformity and density of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 在澆築工序中，應控制混凝土的均勻性和密實性。

sentences.english: On one side , it can avoid wet cloth imbalance which make the product of good-denisty and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 避免溼料布料不均現象，產品密實度好，質量高。

sentences.english: Design, products of high density frequency, cloth speed, high yield of single class.
sentences.chinese: 變頻設計，製品密實度高，布料速度快，單班產量高。

sentences.english: Both dense and good nature of water seepage .
sentences.chinese: 兼有密實及良好的防水防滲性。

sentences.english: Because if you want to make something that's dense and collapsed, it can't be moving too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 因爲如果物質密實收縮，那麼它就不能移動的很快。

sentences.english: This gives the sandwich its distinctive flat shape and wonderfully dense texture.
sentences.chinese: 這使三明治呈現獨特的扁平形狀，質地極其密實。

sentences.english: The man, submerged in his overcoat, listened to the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 那個人用大衣密密實實地裹住全身，聆聽談話。

sentences.english: Working system of pure embroidery, pin dense, novel style, suitable for home display.
sentences.chinese: 純手繡工制，針腳密實，花樣新穎，適合居家擺放。

sentences.english: Three residue base of roads has two types of suspended type and dense type.
sentences.chinese: 道路三渣層有懸浮式和密實式二種類型。

sentences.english: Densifying biomass has been practiced in the US for the past 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 生物質密實一直實行美國在過去40年。

sentences.english: It also creates problems of escaping into the air, or due to packing tightly and causes high pressure drop.
sentences.chinese: 此將會隨氣流溢散或因填充密實而產生高壓損等缺點。

sentences.english: Marinate with seasoning in zip-lock bags, and leave overnight in refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 塗上醃料，以密實袋裝好，放在雪櫃醃過夜。

sentences.english: Don't stretch beyond the point where you begin to feel tightness in the muscle.
sentences.chinese: 不要逞強去拉伸你覺得肌肉密實的部位。

definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
